scripts.build: webpack --mode production & copy public\favicon.ico dist\. & copy public\manifest.json dist\.
scripts.clean:win: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') process.exit(1)" || , if exist build rd /s /q build
scripts.nuke: yarn run clean:win && yarn run nuke:win
scripts.nuke:win: node -e "if (process.platform === 'win32') process.exit(1)" || , if exist node_modules rd /s /q node_modules
